hypothesis_content.title: Bear-to-Neutral Transition via RSI Positive Divergence & Volume Surge
hypothesis_content.statement: In a confirmed BEAR regime, the formation of a bullish divergence on BTC's 3-day RSI (14) — where price makes a lower low but RSI makes a higher low — followed by a daily candle that closes above the prior 3-day high on volume > 1.5x the 20-day average, signals an imminent transition to a NEUTRAL or BULL regime, offering a high-probability long entry.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Positive RSI divergence in a bear market indicates weakening selling momentum. A high-volume close above a multi-day high confirms buyer conviction, often marking the exhaustion of the bear trend and the beginning of a consolidation or reversal phase.
entry_conditions: BTC 3-day chart shows RSI(14) bullish divergence (price LL, RSI HL) over at least two swing lows
BTC daily candle closes above the high of the preceding 3-day period
Daily volume for the breakout candle > 150% of the 20-day average volume

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price reaches the 0.382 Fibonacci retracement level of the entire prior bear market move (from ATH to divergence low)
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price closes below the low of the RSI divergence formation on a daily chart

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If the breakout on high volume is followed, more than 50% of the time in testing, by an immediate rejection and a continuation to new lows within 7 days, invalidating the divergence signal.
